content.rendered:
On10th September, 2015 students from STeP Center Jan Shikshan Sansthan, Dharavi went to R-City Mall at Ghatkopar, Mumbai.

Total of 20 students and 3 teachers were present for the visit. Ms. Reshma Patil, Sales Executive, R-City Mall interacted with the students and shared the skill of managing customer and the working structure of the store. She also explained some important facts of retail management. While visiting the clothes section; they observed that the items were divided into separate sections which help the customer to locate an item soon and there were different sections in retails available like Reliance Fresh, CCD, Westside, Lifestyle, Levis, McDonald, Food Bazaar, Body Shop etc. After observation, students asked their question which promptly answered by the sales executive.

At the billing counter the students were detailed about the working of bar-code machine and were further demonstrated how an items is billed and about the details that are printed on a bill. The students were happy and learned many new things through this visit and look forward to get an employment in this sector.
